TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content:
That's my point, we need a topic.....

Very well:

Topic: how on earth does this work/happen/ect.?
I'm gonna say intensive training or video editing. Also, the way that cat is thrusting its pelvis makes me mildly uncomfortable. 0_o

...Its mainly shaking it, not thrusting it...

It could of been a freak thing it did that they caught on video then edited it?
The only thing that looks edited to me about it is that the video is sped-up. Other than that, it looks very legit. However impossible it may be.
Maybe it isn't a real cat but just a convincing puppet or robot?

It's moving far too fluidly for that...Wait robot?...*eyes Leon* what are you suggesting?

Jokes aside, It can't be a puppet unless they hit the cat with a hammer and added strings to it. (which I very much doubt)

And I very much hope not.

Maybe they forced the cat to move like that somehow?

After staring at my own cat to try and draw conclusions I have decided that it's still way too fluid for that. However, if you look closely you can see that the head and arms just barely don't quite match with the body.

They could've recorded the cat shaking it's pelvis, it waving about, it looking around and put it all together after recording the wall and couch.

Could be, its not the best quality. Why would someone make that?

This is the only thread in the internet where we discuss the makings and reasoning behind cat gifs...

Why would someone make that?

It's the internet. The internet is for cats. Enough said.

Could be, its not the best quality. Why would someone make that?

This is the only thread in the internet where we discuss the makings and reasoning behind cat gifs...

Why do internet people do anything that they do?
Because we have nothing better to do? Because we are all psychopathic? Because we have no life? The list goes on and on..

Because we have nothing better to do? Because we are all psychopathic? Because we have no life? The list goes on and on..

*looks at chocolate dispenser on arm*

Who are you calling psychopathic?
Trekkette, go look at his wish in this thread , it should be the last one on page 176.

herdadurphedurd.

nope! Nope!

Guys, I have a question. Half a bee, philosophically, must ipso facto half not be. But half the bee has got to be, vis-ÃƒÂ -vis its entity - do you see? But can a bee be said to be or not to be an entire bee when half the bee is not a bee, due to some ancient injury?

You've edited it, it was:

Granted. Raiders of the lost ark face-melting scene.

I wish for trekkette :3

You've edited it, it was:
Granted. Raiders of the lost ark face-melting scene.

I wish for trekkette :3

You Lie! *hits in the mouth with rebar*

You've edited it, it was:
Granted. Raiders of the lost ark face-melting scene.

I wish for trekkette :3

For Trekkette to what? Bear in mid your continued existance may depend on your response...
I believe it was in the "object" context, not as a person but as a object.

To post a cat picture.

True story.

@Leon: -snipped because herpderp-

Edited May 30, 2013 by Rage097
No but the way you posted means that you wanted Trekkette in the "Object" context, not as a person doing something.
I do find it fascinating how you're able to make up such a believable story. with plenty of supposed "facts" about it.

Ooookay, backing slowly away from that topic...

How's the weather where everyone is? We got thunderstorms where Chobit and I are today, but for now it's cleared up. Still humid, though.

Texas weather.

'nuff said.
